promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong gecko fighting-type pokemon holding a ornate lance. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lanceleon, a a massive strong gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Shaky Wave, Even Game. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fighting" or "Lanceleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Living in rocky abysses, this colossus reptilian thrives. Mastering the art of balance, its Shaky Wave and Even Game ensure a fair fight.
